The more expensive the item, the better the chances of my wish being fulfilled, right? Yes, that's it! Perhaps I can offer crowns... They can be obtained by defeating the #o9500387#s around here. Oh, please help!
Please eliminate #r100 #o9500387#s#k and return with #b50 Crowns#k! If I offer those up, my wish is sure to come true!
What? Where are the Blue Goblins? They are found in the Goblin Cave, which you can enter by talking to #b#p9000075##k, the Goblin Cave Guard who's standing right over there.
I only asked because you thought you were strong, but I guess I was wrong...
Wow, you brought the #t4000564#s! Oh, look how shiny it is! Please give me the crowns and I'll give them as an offering and pray again.

(Prayer mumble...) If there is no effect after #b1 hour#k has passed, I'll have to offer something else. I'm sure that the chance of my prayers being answered will increase with the more items I offer.
(Faint mumbling...) Fat go away... Fat go away... Fat go away...
